long_description: The Osprey IsoForm4 pack harness lets you personalize your Osprey Ariel backpack with a harness just for women. Personalize your fit and enjoy miles of comfort on the trail. Providing superior load support, this IsoForm women's harness is a 3D dual-density foam that is contoured and anatomically shaped. Thoughtful angles and varying degrees of padding thickness create an anatomic fit for a woman's neck, shoulders and chest. Includes built-in Stow-on-the-Go trekking pole attachment bungees.
short_description: The Osprey IsoForm4 pack harness lets you personalize your Osprey Ariel backpack with a harness just for women. Personalize your fit and enjoy miles of comfort on the trail.
